isis.stitle: CAB: 7000 AND 8000 SERIES MODELS - ADJUSTMENTS - WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: WINDSHIELD WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY

note.para: Spray water on the windshield to determine wiper pattern.

step1.para: Turn wipers on high speed to check wiper pattern on the windshield. Wipers should not run off the glass or stop lower than the horizontal position of the bottom edge of the glass.

figure.caption: Figure 151. Windshield Wiper Arm and Blade Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 4. DRIVER SIDE WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY
5. PASSENGER SIDE WIPER ARM AND BLADE ASSEMBLY

step1.para: If adjustment is needed, lift up on lock lever and remove wiper arm and blade assembly from wiper pivot post.
Reposition wiper arm and blade assembly so it is horizontal to the bottom edge of windshield.
Press wiper arm and blade assembly onto wiper pivot post until assembly locks in place
Turn wipers on high speed and check for proper operation. Repeat adjustment if needed.
